sentence.Network_en: Don't do anything rash until the feel-ings subside.
sentence.Network_cn: 在冷静下来之前不要鲁莽行事。

sentence.Network_en: She waited nervously for his anger to subside.
sentence.Network_cn: 她提心吊胆地等他的怒气平息下来。

sentence.Network_en: The lees of wine gradually subside.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin subsidere, from sub- 'below' + sidere 'settle' (related to sedere 'sit')

entry.tran: (感情)平息，缓和，趋于平静;(噪音)减弱，降低
entry.def: If a feeling or noise subsides, it becomes less strong or loud.

example.ex: The pain had subsided during the night...

example.tran: 凯瑟琳终于慢慢停止了抽泣。

entry.def: If fighting subsides, it becomes less intense or general.

example.ex: Violence has subsided following two days of riots.
example.tran: 两天的暴乱过后，暴力事件开始平息。

entry.def: If the ground or a building is subsiding, it is very slowly sinking to a lower level.

example.ex: Does that mean the whole house is subsiding?
example.tran: 那意味着整个房子正在下陷吗？

entry.tran: (水位)回落;(尤指洪水)减退，消退
entry.def: If a level of water, especially flood water, subsides, it goes down.

example.ex: Local officials say the flood waters have subsided.
example.tran: 当地官员称洪水已经退去了。

means.word_mean: 2. sink to a lower level or form a depression;

sentences.sentence: "the mud subsides when the waters become calm"

means.word_mean: 4. descend into or as if into some soft substance or place;

auth_sentence.content: Thermal imaging shows that it can make inflammation subside.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thermal imaging shows that it can make inflammation subside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thermal imaging shows that it can make inflammation subside.

auth_sentence.content: Community outrage was heated, and refused to subside.
auth_sentence.res_content: Community outrage was heated, and refused to subside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Community outrage was heated, and refused to subside.

auth_sentence.content: This took about four weeks to gradually subside.
auth_sentence.res_content: This took about four weeks to gradually subside.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This took about four weeks to gradually subside.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得考虑的, 相当可观的
stems_affixes.word_buile: consider[v.考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作]+able能……的→adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的
consider考虑+ate……的→考虑到的
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
in进入+side边→adj.&n.&adv.里面[的,地],内部[的,地]
out外面+side边→adj.&n.&adv.外面[的,地],外部[的,地]
considerable[adj.值得考虑的, 相当可观的]+ly表副词→considerably相当地
preside[v.[at,over]主持]+ent人→主持[的人]
preside主持+ium地方或团体→n.主席团
reside[v.居住,驻扎;属于]+nce→n.住处,住宅
considerate[adj.考虑周到的,体谅的]+ion表名词→consideration体谅, 考虑
side旁边→n.边, 旁边, 面;adj.旁边的, 侧面的
side旁边+way路→n.小路, 小巷,人行道
sub下+side坐→坐下去→平息
super在……上面+sede=side坐→坐上去→淘汰[以前的东西]

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"接近,靠近"; 2. 在后面;再; 3. 表示"在下面,次一等,副手"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub接近,靠近+acid酸→adj.略酸的
sub接近,靠近+adult成年人→adj.接近成年的
sub接近,靠近+arctic北极的→adj.近北极的
sub接近,靠近+arid干燥的→adj.有点干燥的
sub接近,靠近+central中心的→adj.接近中心的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+limin门槛+al……的→在门槛下→在意识之下→潜意识的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+miss放+ive……的→放下面→恭顺的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+terr地+anean→地下的
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+area区域→n.分区
sub在下面,次一等,副手+branch枝, 分枝, 分部→n.小分支;支[分]店;分公司

stems_affixes.value_cn: 副助理监督, 副助理主教
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub在下面,次一等,副手+dean教长→n.副助理监督, 副助理主教
sub在下面,次一等,副手+editor编辑→n.助理编辑
sub在下面,次一等,副手+head标题→n.小标题, 副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+office办公室→n.分办事处
sub在下面,次一等,副手+officer官员→n.下级军官
sub在下面,次一等,副手+title标题→n.副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+tropic热带+s→亚热带
sub下面+way道路→n.地道,地铁
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+due债务,义务→减轻
sub在下面,次一等,副手+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压
sub在下面,次一等,副手+merg沉没+e→淹没下去
sub在下面,次一等,副手+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂
sub在下面,次一等,副手+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字→订购
sub在下面,次一等,副手+side坐→坐下去→平息
sub在下面,次一等,副手+vert转→转下去→推翻

means.word_mean: 下降至较低或正常水平

sentences.en: The flooded river was subsiding rapidly.
sentences.cn: 泛滥的河水正在迅速退落。

sentences.en: The hills subsided toward the shore.
After the heavy rains part of the road subsided.
sentences.cn: 大雨过后, 部分公路塌陷了。

means.word_mean: 趋于平静；平静下来；平息；减弱、减轻；消退

sentences.cn: 他慢吞吞地坐在椅子上。

jushi.english: The hills subsided toward the shore.
